remarks: Alternate way to say 3 vectors are mutually independent (rotate right).  (Contributed by NM, 12-Apr-2015.)
statement:
lspindp1.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
lspindp1.o $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` W ) $.
lspindp1.n $e |- N = ( LSpan ` W ) $.
lspindp1.w $e |- ( ph -> W e. LVec ) $.
lspindp2.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. V ) $.
lspindp2.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. ( V \ { .0. } ) ) $.
lspindp2.z $e |- ( ph -> Z e. V ) $.
lspindp2.q $e |- ( ph -> ( N ` { X } ) =/= ( N ` { Y } ) ) $.
lspindp2.e $e |- ( ph -> -. Z e. ( N ` { X , Y } ) ) $.
lspindp2 $p |- ( ph -> ( ( N ` { Z } ) =/= ( N ` { X } ) /\ -. Y e. ( N ` { Z , X } ) ) ) $.
